solution_line_template: Twice as many flyers as Maisie is {maisie_flyers} * {twice} = <<{maisie_flyers}*{twice}={twice_maisie}>>{twice_maisie} flyers.
Donna dropped off five more than that, so she dropped off {twice_maisie} + {donna_more_than_twice} = <<{twice_maisie}+{donna_more_than_twice}={donna_flyers}>>{donna_flyers} flyers.
